Sorry to disappoint but the Newtons aren’t playing live anytime soon (not that I know of anyway). Fortunately I do happen to have this great set of live recordings (previously mentioned here) just waisting away on the server… so I figured I might as well share! This is the entire live concert (edited down to tracks) and presented for the first time ever!

I’m sure this will only interest a few, but give it a shot. If you like it, you’d love the (much better) EP, which was actually recording using “normal” methods and has a much better sound quality. However, the Live album is the only place to find some of their great covers. Enjoy!

PS, I’m sure those of you with sharp eyes will notice that the pictures and recordings are not from the same concert. However, they’re the only ones I had available.

The Newtons are:

Andy Carter – Bass
David Comeaux – Vocals/Guitar
Alex Daugherty – Vocals/Guitar
David Milligan – Keyboard
Stephen Spalding – Percussion

Play it below, or download the tracks here.
